title: Sound On: Russia Threat, Justice Breyer Successor
itunes:title: Sound On: Russia Threat, Justice Breyer Successor
description:
Guests: Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter Greg Stohr, Former Ambassador to Poland Daniel Fried, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Republican strategist, and Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck Senior Policy Advisor, Greta Joynes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
